page.title: 11Traffic Survey -Benfleet
page.content:
On the 10th,13th,18th and 19th of June 1985 a traffic census was conducted. The site of the survey was the War Memorial at Benfleet. On this site is a mini-roundabout, the traffic using this is in three parts :- 1) traffic driving from Canvey 2) traffic driving to Canvey 3) traffic coming from Benfleet with the choice of either going to Canvey or towards Hadleigh etc. The survey was for 10 minutes on each occasion and was from 13.35 to 13.45.
A second part of the survey was conducted at Waterside Farm Canvey. This time the four directions of traffic movement were considered.
